results.description:
Stacki NYC is a meetup for those interested in learning about Stacki, server provisioning, configuration management, and DevOps while meeting others in their area who share the same interests.  This group is for everyone- both Stacki users and beginners to Stacki- you don't need to have any prior experience!

Stacki is an open source CentOS/RHEL bare metal provisioning tool that can take your servers from bare hardware (or virtual hardware) to working Linux, ready to install applications. Stacki does this at scale, so deploying 1000+ servers is no more complex than deploying one. Once your servers are installed with Stacki, you can augment them with configuration tools like Puppet, Chef, Salt, CFEngine, Ansible, etc. 

Join the Stacki community: https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/stacki

Download Stacki: http://www.stacki.com/

Stacki documentation: https://github.com/StackIQ/stacki/wiki

Follow Stacki on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Stacki
results.name: Stacki NYC

results.description:
Come out and Meetup with like-minded individuals ready to serve communities locally and abroad while challenging themselves and growing in faith and fellowship.

Christian Adventure Missions
You’ll Know What To Do When You Get There
Transformational Spiritual and Life Changing Trip For Christians. Zmission experiences awaken your mind and inspire your soul while creating profound and lasting spiritual changes in your life.

Much More Than A Trip
Take an adventure trip that will not only help to transform you but also make a difference in the local community.

Where God’s Taking You
Is god calling you to make a difference in the world? To serve something greater than yourself? Whether he has been tapping you on the shoulder for years or has recently showed up in your life we are here TO SERVE. We are all called TO SERVE… Are you ready?
If you choose to serve, to disciple, to seek wise council, and to share fellowship with other Christians experiencing the grace of god through purpose-driven adventure missions trips then Zmissions is for you.

Travel With Purpose and Impact
Zmissions adventures are long, hard, and sometimes painful, but also transformational, rewarding, and fun. They will bring you much joy and fulfillment. You will continue to push your limits long after the trip is over, knowing “JESUS CHRIST MY LORD AND GOD IN YOU I PUT MY TRUST” Through all the chaos, adventure, and unconditional love, you find what has been missing in your life. These experiences will absolutely transform your life and outlook, but most importantly by putting your faith in Jesus, and believing he can provide everything and more, you will experience a level of living a life that many only dream about.

Feel the Power of God
Feeling the power of God through Discipleship and Fellowship. This became apparent during our first Zmission. It was truly a humbling and eye-opening experience. As we sat together in fellowship after traveling thousands of miles, we realized that we were there to Serve in any way needed and without judgment. Guidance came in the form of wise council trusting in God and seeking his word. To feel the power of God, let go and trust in him and your life will be transformed. Jesus shows up in our lives in powerful ways and guides us along our journeys

What We Can Do to Serve
There are many ways TO SERVE communities around the world and gives new found hope to people who may not have had hope before through Christ. This means bringing groups together to transform lives and opening minds to new realities by embodying the unconditional love of Jesus. It also means we are never above the communities and individuals we serve. No task is to small. We will serve around the world where there is need and you will impact the world in a positive way while making a difference in thousands of people lives along the way.

You’ll Know What To Do When You Get There
Where God leads you next, and the blessings he will bestow will absolutely blow your mind. Where ever we go, what ever we do, when we get there we do what is needed Period. All you have to do is show up and the big man above will handle the rest. What will you do next? Did you feel it? Will you answer the call to SERVE.

Zmissions Team
Jon Christian – Mission Leader

God began taping me on the shoulder at an early age. I remember it like it was yesterday. I”d always been naturally rebellious and found it hard to accept what was taught at Sunday school. Sound Familiar? At the age of about 7, I realized there was something missing while sitting in Church services. I felt like God had a bigger plan. A plan for me to SERVE!

Years passed while my searched continued for connection, purpose, and impact until the day my perspective was changed forever… at my feet written as clear as the day was…”JESUS IS THE WAY”. That was the day I was CALLED SERVE.

I found myself standing on the farthest rock in the ocean I could find. I’d been traveling for miles with 50 lbs. of gear and had not seen my family in two months. As the sun began to set the sky had lit up like fire. The contrast between the blue ocean and the sky was unlike anything I have ever seen before. It was as if God himself was staring back at me looking deep within my soul. My hair began to stand up the same way it had when I found “JESUS IS THE WAY” written in concrete so many years before. A voice from within, not the voice you hear from internal conversations you have in your head on a normal day, this was all encompassing vibrating energy coming from both outside and within, it was coming from my heart and the entire world around me. The words spoken to me were “WELL DONE, YOU MADE IT…NOW GO AND TELL THE WORLD.

The adventures and the journey are long, hard, and sometimes painful, but also transformational, rewarding, and have brought much joy and fulfillment in my life. I continue to push my limits, praying “JESUS CHRIST MY LORD AND GOD IN YOU I PUT MY TRUST” Through all the chaos and adventure, and a chance meeting with my Guardian Angel who taught me what unconditional love is I had found what I had been looking for since the age of 7. These experiences have absolutely transformed my life and outlook but most importantly by putting my faith in Jesus and believing he could provide everything and more that we needed I experienced a level of living a life that many only dream about.

Where God lead me next, and the blessings he bestowed on me to this day absolutely blow my mind. Where ever we go, what ever we do, when we get there we do what is needed Period. All you have to do is show up and the big man above will handle the rest. What will you do next? Did you feel it? Will you answer the call to SERVE.

After a long and sometimes lonely journey, I’ve found wise counsel and fellowship in Christ. Now it’s your turn, we climb this mountain and embark on the adventure together.

John Albino – Mission Leader

John Albino started Absolute Music Studios with one goal in mind… to create a warm and inviting musical atmosphere that he himself would want to come to. It all started with the desire to live a more community-oriented life and to be around to raise his children instead of living on the road, which he did for many years. John has worked with musicians from many of the biggest names in the music business over the years, including KISS, The Pretenders, Wings, Billy Joel, Foreigner, Pat Travers and Quiet Riot, to name a few.

He has also worked as a studio musician, playing on sessions with many top producers including Stephen Gelfas and Charlie Midnight.
Now he has created a first class music studio staffed with the best player-teachers in the area. He brings decades of musical expertise and the benefit of years of front-line professional experience to Absolute Music, his own unique creation. Using that experience as a musician and a vision to guide him, he set out to build a studio where many could come and pursue their passion for music in a warm and inviting family-oriented atmosphere, while being taught by the finest teachers available. Absolute Music is now firmly established as one of the best and busiest music lesson studios in the area. John’s continual dedication to and involvement with the surrounding communities plays a crucial role in his success, while also providing community enrichment through music.
results.name: Zmissions Christian Adventure Group Hazlet, NJ

results.description: This group provides a safe space to explore how yoga and mindfulness can help make a difference in your life, reduce stress, start living in the present moment and lead to better self-care. I am Diana S. Ramos, a Registered Dietitian/Nutritionist and yoga instructor. I practice a mind-body approach to nutrition and well-being, and empower each individual to develop a healthy relationship with their bodies, mind and food. My mission is to help individuals thrive into a more joyful, healthy and mindful lives. I discovered the real benefits of yoga in the most difficult times in my life. I was at my peak levels of stress, anxiety and unhappiness. Yoga helped me find peace within myself. Through the practice of yoga I discovered that stress, anxiety and unhappiness were rooted from not living and accepting the present moment. I noticed I was either in living in the past or worrying about the future, but never present moment, in what is. Yoga helped me to kindly move into the present moment, decrease self-judgement, and cultivate self-compassion, self-love and self-acceptance. I would like to share this experience and practice with you. This group offers yoga and wellness workshops, to help you dive into the present moment, release stress and anxiety, and help you to compassionately take care of you. Allow yoga to help you connect with your body. Yoga is not about how flexible you are but how flexible you can become on your mat and in real life with you and your thoughts. Yoga is not about competing, comparing, or judging, it is about self-acceptance, self-love and self-compassion. Yoga is a practice where no experience necessary. The only requirement is you and an open mind. This is an invitation to take care of your body and mind. My Motto: Embrace. Love. Nurture. Embrace who you are. Love yourself just as you are. In order to Nurture yourself the right way.
results.name: Nourish Body & Mind

Though it doesn’t sound like it, WorldChoiceModels (WCM) is all about photography! However, what makes us different than the average "photography meetup" is how we work. Overall, WorldChoiceModels is run by myself and the models, where the models create themed events for this community of photographers.  Photographers are invited to attend, for a fee, where they  to come to take pictures, learn from each other, and enjoy! NO TFP work!  Photographers are not expected nor are they required to provide images to the models! The models are compensated for their time. 

We take pride in the fact that creativity, affordability, and dependability is what WorldChoiceModels will be known for in the community of photographers. 

Models: This group's intention is to have the models host events and function as part of the leadership team of the group. Models are always encouraged to join the group, if interested in hosting events, please contact us directly. WCM Models are hospitable, dependable, creative, hard-working and have a drive for success. Join us! 

Photographers: All are welcome! No matter how much experience you have. WorldChoiceModels is a place where photographers can network, and effortlessly practice, practice, practice, while working with reliable and talented models. We welcome all photographers who want to be creative, learn new skills, perfect old ones, and have fun.

We love what we do, but more importantly, we love sharing what we do. 

Join us and attend our many shooting opportunities. 

Cheers,
WorldChoiceModels 
John Bodensiek, Founder

Sandstorm is an open source operating system for personal and private clouds. Sandstorm is the easiest way you've ever seen to run Google Drive alternative web apps like Etherpad, Davros, SandForms, Hacker Slides, and Etherpad on your own server. We also have other great web apps like Gitlab, Rocket.Chat, WordPress, and Wekan on our App Market.

Meet Sandstorm's core developers as well as users, app developers, and people who are excited to run Sandstorm for themselves or for their company. We'll learn from each other, share info about apps we like and apps we wrote, and have conversations about where Sandstorm should go next. Please join us! 

For more information about Sandstorm: 
www.sandstorm.io

Twitter: 
www.twitter.com/Sandstormio

Facebook: 
www.facebook.com/sandstorm.io

Google+: 
www.plus.google.com/+SandstormIo

This allows us to connect and work with guides and helpers and to receive messages/direction and/or to access deep states of healing with intention. 

Whether it is your first time or you are familiar with journeying, you are welcome to join! This is a safe and sacred space where all paths are welcome.

results.description:
What we are about?

This Meetup group is for people that are willing to meet in the name of Jesus Christ from house to house and in public places. We want to meet at least once a week, to speak of Jesus Christ and the Scriptures, to pray together, to continue in the apostles teachings and in fellowship, and in the breaking of bread.

It is written, there is one who scatters, yet increases more; and there is one who withholds more than is right, but it leads to poverty. This group is to "scatter" the word of God, to give free course to the Scriptures. As long as we are willing to rightly divide the word of truth, every man and woman has a part in the conversation. We can edify each other in love. I put one block of truth, and you can put another block of truth.

You can expect to be part of a spiritual conversation, and the opportunity to exercise your spiritual gifts as long as we do all things decently and in order. When we come together, every single member has. One has a psalm, another a doctrine, someone else a tongue, another one a revelation, the next man an interpretation. Let all things be done for edifying of the body of Christ.

The Gospel

The Gospel of Jesus Christ is the glad tidings of the kingdom of God unto the meek, liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound, the proclamation of the day of salvation, the acceptable year of the Lord (Isa 52:6-7, 61:1-2, Luk 4:18-19, 8:1); whereby God sent and anointed his son Jesus Christ to preach the Gospel and to be the saviour of the world. (1 Jn 4:14) The Gospel of Jesus Christ is the power of God unto salvation to everyone that believes whether Jew or Greek (Rom 1:16-17) to all them that call upon him (Rom 10:12-15). For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith.  The Gospel declares that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures, he was buried, and rose again the third day according to the scriptures, that he was seen of Cephas, the twelve and then of five hundred brethren at once. (1 Cor 15:1-3) Through the Gospel we understand that that the stone which was rejected is become the head of the corner.  Jesus Christ who was rejected and crucified rose again the third day according to the scriptures, and is now exalted far above all principalities and powers (Ps 118:22-23, Mat 21:42, Acts 4:10-12, 1 Cor 15:1-3, Eph 1:20-21). This tried stone is none other than Jesus Christ; whose name is called Wonderful, Counsellor, The Mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace. (Isa 7:10-14, Mat 1:21-23; Is 8:10-18, 9:6-7; 1 Pet 2:4-8). This is the true God and eternal life (1 Jn 5:20).

An essential part of the gospel is understanding what it means that Jesus is the Christ.  It is written, that He whom God has sent speaks the words of God, for God did not give the Spirit by measure unto Him (Jn 3:34). This verse speaks of Jesus of Nazareth, a body that God prepared, so that the fullness of the Father would be manifested in him (Heb 10:5). As the Scripture says, For in him dwelleth all the fullness of the Godhead bodily (Col 1:19).  This is the mystery of Christ, even the mystery of godliness. God was manifest in the flesh, justified in the Spirit, seen of angels, preached unto the Gentiles, believed on in the world, received up into glory (1Ti 3:16). He that sees Jesus, sees Him that sent him (Jn 12:45). This is to the mind that has understanding. The name of the Father is Jesus. The name of the Son is Jesus. The name of the Holy Ghost is Jesus. These are spiritual words, and they owe to be discerned spiritually. This is what Jesus meant, when he said that he was the Son of God. For since the very beginning it was written, Let us make man in our image, after our likeness (Gen 1:16). Jesus Christ is that man, he is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn of every creature (Col 1:15). God was in Christ, and not another. I repeat again, Christ received the Spirit of God without measure. The prophet Isaiah foresaw this and speaking as the oracles of God wrote that a child will be born unto us, that a son will be given. And that his name shall be called the mighty God, the everlasting Father. We are also called to be partakers of such fullness, to come in the unity of the faith, the knowledge of the Son of God, to grow unto that perfect man, unto the measure and stature of Christ (Eph 4:13). We are also called to receive the Spirit of Christ. God will give us the Holy Ghost if we obey Him (Acts 5:32). Men and brethren, what must we do in order to obey God?

Jesus Christ came preaching repentance and that the kingdom of heaven is at hand (Mat 4:17). In order to enter into the kingdom of God we must be born again of the water and of the Spirit (Jn 3:3-5). Those early disciples in the book of Acts were born again when they repented, were baptized in the name of Jesus Christ (born of the water), and received the infilling of the Holy Ghost (born of the Spirit). (Acts 2:37-41, 8:12-17, 9:17-18, 10:44-48, 19:1-6) The baptisms in the book of Acts were done in the name of Jesus Christ (Acts 2:38, 4:12, 8:12, 10:48, 19:5, Gal 3:27, Rom 6:3-4, Col 2:12). In order to obey the Gospel and enter into the kingdom of God we too must do what those early disciples did and what Jesus commanded. Repent therefore, and be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of your sins and you too shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost (Acts 2:38-39). Please take the time to look up the scriptures listed in this study (Acts 17:11).

this group accomplishes two things. since I just moved to Montclair, I need and want to meet new people and I want to start scrapbooking.

(where the 7-11 is and the Panera and smash burger)


Cheers,

Piper

FetNet Arts & Events is an authentic fet-alt community.

This is your opportunity to explore the fet-alt culture and meet like-minded friends . 

Please do note that we are a dues paying organization; basic membership (free during launch phase). 

Options post launch phase:

We will offer members unprecedented opportunities to connect with kinksters and fet-alt artists both locally and globally. Our companion site DsNation will provide a playspace where D/s lovers can connect for close encounters and more.  The FetNet site will enable members to share personal video content and view pro galleries,streaming content and events from around the world.  

Our member-driven forums will keep FetNet members up-to-date on local niche kink events as well as major festivals and expos.

Please do include a very descriptive personal profile as to your interest and preferences. 

Include all the kinky details pretty pleeeeze.

Don't forget your sexiest pics/videos. ;-)~

Our vision...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nQ-i654tT_c


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HHZXrm_e8m4

 is about safe, real-world interactions and exploration. So don't be shy. Our event planners will assist you in  organizing your event at a local club, private residence--or even plan a sexy cruise.

Know of a kink-friendly venue? Please drop us a line about their location and special features.email:fetnetartsevents.com  

Are you a kink service provider/vendor/blogger? Inquire about your free space on our global platforms: 

DsNation and FetNet Arts & Events. Send us pics, clips bio and links to your site. Leave a phone number and best time to chat about how you might like to partner with us long-term.

Want to sponsor or design an unforgettable party,expo,fetish ball,meet & greet event? Drop us a line and our event planners will collaborate with you via our FetNet virtual planning module. Every detail from floor plans to catering and sourcing entertainment can be done from the comfort of your home or office. Tired of the predictable vanilla so called hedonist adventures? Let our planners assist you in custom designing a truly singular vacation or weekend escapade...at a deep discount. 

FetNet brings fantasies to life...

                                      Neil Patrick Harris: Still a better idea than watching Fifty Shades.

Our Meetup group, is part of the global cultural shift certainly underscored by the "50 Shades of Grey" phenomenon. Many are still scratching their heads: asking why why such an awkward silly wannabe-- sorry- excuse- for- D/s erotica created such a stir. 

Exhibit A:

She Said~ 

Dude, I would watch that show. But no joke the tone was more spastic than a herd of gerbils hopped up on crystal meth flipping from dark drama to more light-hearted comedic fare and back again (not to mention stalking is the new black; all the cool billionaire sadists are doing it). Even die-hard fans were laughing along with me at some of the more melodramatic fails in the film and the mother-daughter duo to my right (because nothing says family bonding than bondage porn) were less-than-blown-away saying to each other after the credits rolled “well it wasn’t that bad” and “it kind of grew on you.”

Still a better idea than watching Fifty Shades.Verdict

He Said~

An insufferably stupid erotic film. Any author or screenwriter at the end of their rope because they know that they’ll never be good enough to be published or produced, can use Fifty Shades of Grey to know they are good enough. You are good enough, writer! Even if you suck, which you might if your self-esteem is that low, you can know that since something like this has been released to the masses, you have hope. And even if you do get rejected by everyone, at least you can know that your boo probably loves you. And if your relationship is even creepier than the one portrayed here, at least one of you probably has some sort of personality. And if you’re single, at least you have alcohol.

We think the better question is what does this global craze say about the void that exist? 

While this tragic attempt at erotic art has been bashed to pieces--one thing is clear. There's a lot of curiosity about fet-alt erotica. Obviously-- vanilla erotica is limited, uninspiring or perhaps just plain boring to millions of women and even men around the world. It's sad to contemplate so many kinksters all dressed up with no place to go. Let's fix that right away.

Join us in our quest to make an infinitely more sex- positive planet. 


"A Fantasy is a terrible thing to waste."

Girl Talk 101 MeetUp group is for woman of all ages who are interested in looking and feeling their very best. Get the insider's scoop on the retail marketing of products and end the confusion of the shelves' trial & error.  

Let's face it. Most women have a love-hate relationship with their makeup & their skin care. The lack of knowledge & education available to the consumer is scary to be frank. Misleading labels in the nutrition, skincare and cosmetic industry has caused many of us all to spend so much money on products that simply don't perform the way you thought they would. The one size fits all philosophy has never worked for me, and if you are of the same thinking, this group is for you. 

My passion is to share with you what I have learned over the years and bring new understanding to you on how our bodies work; from the inside out. Learn how your skin functions & ages and how to treat it on any budget. Customize your makeup regimen from the right foundation to the perfect finishing touches.    Discover how your digestive health affects every organ of your body, and how to adjust accordingly. 

Feel your very best at any age. Why would we settle for anything less? 

Come out and join us for fun & informative skin & makeup workshops which cover all the beauty basics and then some! Let's end the madness, share our experiences and empower each other. 

All are welcome with reservations appreciated for each workshop, the first one is my gift to you. Choose your interest, mark your calendar, and we'll see you soon!

Let the beauty of what you love, show in everything you do.

Jodi Usher

results.description:
This is a brand NEW Toastmasters club that is forming in Edison, NJ named "What Exit? Toastmasters" This club is geared towards anyone looking to improve their speaking and leadership skills while having fun and making new friends. We will hold one regular monthly meeting at 3 pm on the 3rd Saturday afternoon of each month with potential additional monthly meetings or events to follow. At What Exit? Toastmasters, we understand you're busy. Your commute and/or work schedule probably prevents you from taking some time to get out, work on your development and network as you'd like so when you DO come to work on these skills we also want you to experience a friendly environment, with a good sense of humor.

Just a few reasons you should visit What Exit 
1. Convenient Centrally located weekend afternoon meetings - no worries about trying to find time during your lunch break or after work. We meet the 3rd Saturday of each month at 3 pm in Edison, NJ, leaving you plenty of time for weekend plans/family and other commitments 
2. Increase your communication skills - not only speaking but listening! Strong communication skills help you both personally and professionally.
3. A chance to be part of a 91 year strong professional international organization with unlimited networking opportunities
4. Advance your communication and leadership skills at your own pace with real time feedback from mentors and fellow members 
5. Cost of a professional development seminar - thousands of dollars. Cost of a community college credit in NJ $100+. Monthly dues for What Exit? - only $7 a month. 
6. Earn education credentials that you can put on your resume to advance your career
7. Because we have the best club name in NJ and you're just going to sound cool to say you're a member 
8. Get the opportunity to help start a brand new club and help contribute to its success! 
9. Optional social events after each meeting to help you meet people and make connections as well as have fun!
10. Overcome your fear of public speaking and learn to think on your feet with impromptu speaking 
11. Warm, welcome, encouraging and supportive environment! 
12. Prepare for your next work presentation, sales pitch, interview in a safe environment 
13. Pick up or enhance skills in marketing, time management, project management, delegation, budgeting, record keeping and more
14. You get to have FUN while you do all of the above!

What are you waiting for? Come to our next info meeting and bring a friend (or multiple friends!)

results.description:
Ladies, Are you tired of the barrage of, “Hey baby, what’s up gorgeous” or corny pickup lines and love poem messages from men you wouldn’t date in the real world on OKCupid and Match? Sick of the unwanted cock photos on Tinder? Frustrated when men like your profile on OkCupid and you like theirs back, but when you’re a mutual match or you send a message you get nothing but radio silence? 


Fellas, Are you sick of sending a thousand messages a day to the hotties of your dreams but hearing nothing back? Are you sick of the women only looking for Ryan Gosling lookalikes and a fat wallet? 

If you’ve ever thought, “Why the fuck am I on this stupid website in the first place?” This is the group for you! This group is for everyone who is sick of the game that is online dating and wants to go back to meeting people the organic, normal way—you know, like, in real life. No more messaging or texting that goes nowhere. Just straight up face-to-face meetings right away and offline. Let’s be honest here folks. Statistically, you're not going to meet the love of your life/future wife or husband online and those who do are the exception—not the rule. This group will be like skipping the whole messaging part and going straight to coffee and a meet and greet. 


I started this group because, like you, I find myself single again in this daunting city and have resulted to online dating. Now I remember how much it sucks!!!! I know how hard it is to meet people in NYC and I know I’m not alone about how I feel. This group is also good for people new to the city that are interested in meeting great people. I have some FREE, fun, simple and creative ideas for this group, but I want to wait to see how many members it gets before starting meetups. So

 1. If you’re down with the cause, join this group 

2. If you’re interested in being a co organizer and getting in on this with me, message me

 3. If you have some fun dating ideas for this group you would like to share, message me 

4. If you’re single in NYC and, you know, don’t want to be single anymore, join this group! 


BYE!
results.name: Online Dating Sucks Singles Group NYC

results.description:
Are you searching for meaning in your life?
Have you ever felt happiness in your life...
...never lasts?

This Buddhist group has a great positive, multi-cultural atmosphere that helps people search for the answer to life's biggest questions.
Through the teachings of Buddha and historical Pure Land Buddhist teachers we understand better the direction our life needs to take in order to find the purpose of life.
We offer video lectures and have meetings to discuss how to obtain an absolute form of happiness.
I hope you'll stop by and attend a meeting when you have a chance!

Below, you'll find some more information about what Buddhism is all about as well as our contact info and location.
In Buddhism, we learn that there are two kinds of joy.

Relative Happiness

All the happiness we know is called Relative Happiness.
Money, status, fame, wealth, family, friends, and our loved ones are all included in this category.
Politics, economics, medicine, and the arts also try to provide us with Relative happiness.
We seek for this type of happiness day in, day out hoping we can attain true satisfaction from it.

Absolute Happiness

We are all seeking for a happiness which will truly last.
This kind of happiness is called Absolute Happiness.
The purpose of life is to attain it as quickly as possible while still alive.

Learn more at our meetups and check out some of our topics:
The Law of Cause and Effect
Six Good Deeds that Bring Happiness
Mirror of Truth
Dark Mind is the Root Cause of Suffering
results.name: New York Buddhism and Purpose of Life Meetup

The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) New York Chapter is a professional networking and educational association of 750+ Members in ten specialty Forums. IIDA NY provides our Members with the resources to reach expertise, knowledge and contacts. Networking and social events allow professionals and industry members to connect on more personal terms that encourage trust, collaboration, and innovation.

Our Chapter is proud to have been recognized as IIDA Large Chapter of the Year in 2011, 2008, 2001 and 2000.

The International Interior Design Association (IIDA) is the Commercial Interior Design Association with a global reach. We support design professionals, industry affiliates, educators, students, firms and their clients through our network of 15,000+ Members across 58 countries. We advocate for advancements in education, design excellence, legislation, leadership, accreditation, and community outreach to increase the value and understanding of Interior Design as a profession that enhances business value and positively impacts the health and well-being of people’s lives every day.

Visit us at http://www.iidany.org

results.description:
Technical competency and problem solving skills are essential to the success of our children. Many initiatives have been introduced to provide more STEM education; however, the efforts have largely focused on older children, mostly high school and junior high school students. Research suggests that children should be exposed to technology at an earlier age so that it becomes second nature to them. To that end, a new space is under construction to provide hands-on experience in technology to elementary school aged children (pre-K to 5th graders). Children will experiment with technology by building and programming robots, coding with Scratch/Blockly, creating animations and websites, designing circuit-based projects, and much, much more. We anticipate an early spring launch. 

In the meantime, we would welcome any volunteer who is interested in advancing this initiative to please contact us and let us know how you would like to help. We are a nonprofit organization (501(c)3 designation is in the works). We would love to hear from you!

results.description:
Ever find your self hunting ANSWERS in the business, psychology or self-help sections of bookstores, ONLINE or doing Yoga? What if you could upgrade your thoughts, feelings,habits and future like the apps on your tablet or smartphone? Are you stuck and can't get your life moving faster. What if there are NEW methods to RESET your life like when your smartphone freezes. "UPGRADE And RESET YOUR LIFE" provides tools that will make you happier, more passionate about life, more productive on your dreams, and wealthier. We will get you to "do life" and not just learn "about" it. You will make discoveries about yourself, stop negative thoughts, develop better habits, evolve beyond your wildest dreams. Each session you will practical cognitive tools to immediately take your life to the next level.
This is Not the lecture format you have seen and done many times in the past, there are better ways to learn and gain rapid results.

                                                  Forming A Community Of Shared "Specific Mind" Practices 

Our mission is to build a wide community of friends, family, and coworkers using New-art and other tools together during meetup sessions and in their daily lives.
What makes this different from anything else in the world, is each member will work on their "Specific Mind." For the first time ever people interested in self-improvement will work on their "Specific Mind" instead of an abstract philosophy of how people should work.
There are tools that can effect both emotions and habits. Like brain mapping you will learn to capture your specific unique mind, take measurements of habits, thoughts and emotions. Place the palm of your hand on your forehead. You are now centimeters form your frontal and prefrontal cortex. This is only one brain system out of the many that produce your unique personality and habits profile. We will take abstract concepts and transform them through the knowledge of neural science and physics into powerful physical tools you can touch. Self directed improvement could be so much more than short-lived inspiration.


                                                        Each SESSION Will Use New Art

A combination of cognitive, Neuro science and visual Art designed to unlock the architecture of your mind hidden within the vast landscape of your brain. New Art will allow each person to understand their own "Specific-Mind" like a MRI for the mind. The primary emphasis of New Art is developing self-awareness and choices. It becomes easy to literally see your limitations and problems while also seeing powerful solutions no other tools can provide. You will enhance the best of yourself while upgrading your life in ways beyond your dreams. Join this group to start UPGRADING YOUR LIFE each week. You will have fun while making real changes in your life. 

Each Session members will hold in their hands printed sheets of Art work they will use to record parts of their minds, solve problems, communicate with their minds (different from meditation), record measurements of mental activity. With the Art Work members of the community will be able to show each others what they are working on each week. Personal improvement moves form a philosophical talk to show me your Art work and what you are working on. Members will select projects and goals they will work on as individuals and within the community making possible everything form habit change, weight release, less stress, greater mental focus, solving business problems, removing fears and anxieties, becoming free from shyness, emotional clarity and more.  


GAIN CLARITY ABOUT WHAT YOU REALLY WANT IN YOUR BUSINESS AND PERSONAL LIFE

MAKE REAL CHANGES TO YOUR THOUGHTS, FEELINGS AND ACTIONS

DISCOVER THE HIDDEN ASSETS NEEDED TO BUILD YOUR FUTURE

TRANSFORM YOUR PAST INTO AN INVALUABLE SOURCE OF NEW POSSIBILITIES

USE YOUR EMOTIONS AS RESOURCES

YOU WILL DISCOVER HOW TO SET AND ACHIEVE GOALS IN THE REAL WORLD

DRAMATICALLY ENHANCE YOUR COMMUNICATION SKILLS

EACH SESSION WILL BE WILL BUILD ON THE LAST AND TAKE TO THE NEXT STEP
results.name: UPGRADE AND RESET YOUR LIFE

results.description:
********the first meeting is mandatory without a good reason if u miss three meetups u will taken out of the group if u don't have a good reason.

cheers

piper

<br>

"it is a luxury to b understood."----Emerson

<br>

"there are only two ways to live your life: one way is as though nothing is a miracle, the other is as though everything is a miracle."

<br>

"Don't judge somebody, just because they fuck up differently than u."

<br>

this is a support circle for moms in all situations, be it maternity leave, a stay at home mom and whose also new to Montclair, maybe a mom who literally needs a network because they are having a difficult time with post partum depression or even anxiety.  as a friend to many women from my moms group in Hoboken, a mom friend from the mother's center of central new jersey, I know mom friends who are extremely uncomfortable in their shell as a stay at home mom and I know the moms who always wanted to b stay at home moms.   i know moms who love their job and would never give it up even if they hit the lottery.  it doesn't matter if u work and have some time to spend away from your kids, u deserve this group. 

who wouldn't receive more smiles and laughs in their day if they could?   sometimes people even act differently if they are home sweeping and burping a child all day than when they perform at work. there has been studies on it. sometimes isolation occurs not to mention losing yourself in your child. it happens esp if u r a perfectionist like me. 

this is a support group for moms, it can b a networking group for moms, (lots of working full time moms are insecure that they don't know other mom friends.) most importantly id like you to c this as a friendship circle of moms who will know one another for a very very long time.  leave all your biases at the door, and take a rest once a week with us.  lets rest once a week and talk see how many of our lives are surprisingly the same.

cheers

piper

results.description:
WorldChoiceModels is where models take charge and host events for photographers in a variety of themes and locations: Bridal shoots, engagement shoots, portraits, fashion, action, sport, lifestyle, commercial branding, etc. Photographers can also request for themed events. Events are limited to 4 photographers. Most models seem to prefer 3 photographers. Those events with more than 4 are called paparazzi shoot-outs, they typically cost less. Some events are meet and greets or promotional events.

The models chosen to be on the team have been interviewed and have passed a series of criteria to participate. These models are professional and work well beyond the time behind the camera: They scout locations, contact venues, determine if permits are required or not and obtain them if feasible. Some events require they rent wardrobe or equipment and it doesn't need to be explained that there is a great deal of time doing all of that. This group nor the models do any TFPs... Ever. What's nice is the photographers never have to spend any time editing, copying or distributing pictures to models. That's right. Photographers are not obligated to share their pictures nor are the models expecting any from them. WorldChoiceModels is ideal for:

• Photographers that want to do street photography or photowalks with a model. • Photographers looking to practice their skills, experiment with their equipment or technique.

• Photographers looking to expand their portfolios. bridal, senior portraits, couples, fashion, commercial lifestyle, editorial, etc. From time to time there will be workshops on studio lighting, and specific genres. So keep a look out. Hopefully changing the name will attract women photographers ,which I know are many.

This is an excellent forum to practice and build your portfolio. In the next few months you will notice some admin activity and shortly after the models will take charge,

My best to everyone

John Bodensiek
results.name: !! "Brooklyn - New York - Model Events for Photographers"

results.description:
Tribute Strength is a CrossFit gym run & operated by people with similar goals, morals & values. We are genuine people that care. Genuine people with a background in fitness, athletics & coaching. People who respect the process of becoming fit & all the obstacles along the way. We’re people just like anyone else. We have families of our own. We understand that life is a gentle and tricky balance of caring for oneself as well as our loved ones. Far too often the former gets neglected and we can say that because we’ve been there. We’ve been down that road. Ultimately we decided it was time to make time. Time to make fitness a goal and embrace the truth that is the fragility of life. 

CrossFit is defined as, “Constantly varied functional movements performed at relatively high intensity.” It combines cardiovascular endurance, weightlifting & gymnastics to form the foundation of measurable fitness & health. Often performed in a class & teamwork atmosphere, CrossFit prides itself on community. It’s that very community or team that makes working hard fun. The philosophy, in a nutshell, at Tribute Strength is to get ourselves and our members fit, happy and healthy. 

Intrigued? Want to learn more? We welcome you to come into Tribute and have fun, get fit & leave with a smile!


Tribute Strength - CrossFit Woodland Park

20 Andrews Drive - Unit 3, Woodland Park, NJ

www.tributestrength.com

Follow us on Facebook & Instagram!
results.name: Tribute Strength - CrossFit Classes!

results.description: Greetings babysitting swappers and exchangers! Hope this message finds you and your families well! This is a group for families looking for like minded parents to do babysitting swaps/exchanges with and virtually save on all monetary cost associated with child care. Anyone can create meetups and-or post. We have a free conference call line. This group is the resource that you need whether you are an eventful, active, career parent or a hard-working, resilient stay-at-home parent having the time to accomplish task or take time for your self to replenish so that you can be fully available for your family and career is priceless. This group is great for parents who have enough energy reserved to be available for children in addition to their own. Whether it is once a week or more that you do exchanges, this group WILL allow you to save on babysitters and expensive child care cost within a supportive network of families that also provides opportunity to nurture, love and teach each others children. We are parents ourselves and that experience alone can be so significant in having peace on who we are leaving our children with when we do exchanges. We invite all exchangers to meetup at some of the fun, free and low cost events posted in this group when exchanging. This group is founded on the principle that it takes a village to raise our children. In order to participate you mainly need to have enough energy and time reserved to care for children in addition to your own in a loving, safe manner. Homeschool parents, Single parents, Married parents, Foster parents, Aunties and Uncles raising neices and nephews, Grandparents raising grandchildren and more lets greet eachother, meet-up, get to know one another in this co-op to save on day and night care! Share with family, friends and neighbors. The bigger our network is the more resources we have for our families to swap with and even for backup care. <br>Please note that you should be willing to share who you are, your lifestyle, background and personal info as appropriate with the families that you are exchanging babysitting with. We all want to trust, know and feel safe with who are children are left with during an exchange. Discuss who your child is and any rules you want to take place while you are exchanging. Tips and advice will be posted in the group for help on how to safely do exchanges. This group and it's founder are not responsible or liable for any injury, accidents or harm done to your child/children. You MUST get to thoroughly know the familes you are doing exchanges with! Join our yahoo group for more updates, information, free resources and more. Http://groups.yahoo.com/parent_exchange
results.name: Parents Exchange Group

"We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make our world."
-Buddah

We all know the term "Law of Attraction." But, what is it, really? How does it work? And, what practical place does it have in day-to-day life?

The purpose of this group is to answer these questions, as well as bring like-minded people together to form a network of support in living with clear intention. 

You'll learn about the Universal Laws and Abraham Hicks' processes and practices. This will help you shift your energetic vibration, align with your higher self and empower you to deliberately create a life you love.

Coming together as a group to do this type of work is incredibly powerful. This is truly our life's work, and committing to our lives in this way is not only transformational for us. It's transformational for those around us.

This group meets the first Thursday of every month at 8pm.

Facilitated By: Jayme Cooper, Certified Law of Attraction Life Coach.

For a list of past book discussions, look here. 

Thanks for your consideration, and see you soon! Take a look at our upcoming Meetup(s)!

Note: I will be enforcing a strict no-show policy. If you do not show up to 2 Meetups without letting me know in advance, you will be removed from Good Book Hunting. Thanks for your help. 

------

results.description: If you're on meetup.com, chances are you know the importance of networking to generate new business. Networking leads to business referrals which are THE fastest way to grow your business. Over 98% of businesses get business from referrals, yet only 3% of those businesses have a plan to consistently get those referrals. Are you ready to join the 3%? For 30 years BNI has used a simple but elegant philosophy that exemplifies membership, "Givers Gain." By helping other members grow their business those same members will in turn help you grow your business. In 2014 BNI members passed 6.6 million referrals that generated an amazing $8.6 billion worth of closed business. Whether you're new to BNI or have some experience, chances are you've never seen anything like Revenue Raisers before. We're 20+ (and counting) highly motivated, enthusiastic and generous professionals that genuinely care about each other and growing each others business from consistent warm referrals. Our members span from fields as diverse as real estate, legal, tech, marketing, finance, and health and wellness. We have power teams that can take you and your business to that next level. Best of all, we only allow one person per profession. If your profession isn't yet represented in our chapter, you could quickly become the go-to guy or gal. Imagine what having 20+ hungry salespeople looking for new business for you around the clock could do for your business. Are you our next success story? RSVP to our next meeting (Tuesdays at 7:00AM at Junior's) and see for yourself how BNI can change your business and your life for the better. Because, who couldn't use a smoking hot referral RIGHT NOW?! Current Location: Junior's 386 Flatbush Ave Ext Brooklyn, NY 11201 Cost: $20/visitor The meeting starts at 7:00am and is officially over at 8:30am. You will need to bring 50+ business cards to pass to everyone in the room. You will also need to be prepared to tell the room who you are, what you do, and who a perfect referral for you would be. The more specific you are in asking for the referral the greater chance you have in receiving that life changing referral on the spot.
results.name: BNI Revenue Raisers, Brooklyn NY

This is a place where women can let down their guard, be vulnerable, and speak their truth while being held in a safe space. Circles happen on or near the evening of the new moon because this is the best time, astrologically, to plant seeds for what we long to manifest in our lives and for the world. Setting intentions with a group is a powerful practice because it allows your dreams and longings to be witnessed and supported by others. It also holds you accountable to taking the necessary action, internally and externally, to manifest your longings. While every circle has a different theme, there in always meditation, group sharing (optional), and the writing and speaking of individual intentions. Circles may also incorporate aspects of spiritual ceremony and ritual; however, it is not religious and open to women of all ages, backgrounds, beliefs, and faiths. Allow yourself to be supported by the heavens and held in the energies of the Divine Feminine as you make space for new awareness, transformation, and manifestation.

results.description:
This new group is for people who work from home, and need to get out of the house more!  Come meet flesh-and-blood real people, who live the way you do!

We will get together now and then for a drink at the end of the day (or breakfast or lunch sometimes).  The idea is to substitute a bit for the camaraderie that our office-based colleagues enjoy during their lunches and TGIFs! 

We hope to make friends and learn from each other about not just business/technology but also politics, culture, or whatever else comes up.  Venues and times will vary according to participant suggestions.

Our definition of "work" is broad.  Examples are: writing/editing; sales/marketing; web/graphic design; accounting; software; customer support; nonprofit work; start-up ventures; and so forth.  You could work remotely for an established company, or be a freelancer or solo practitioner.  The common thread is that you spend the day at your desk at home, with just your computer and phone connecting you to other human beings!

Unlike some other meetups, this group has no hidden agenda.  The organizer is not promoting any self-help plan, consulting service, business opportunity, lead-generation system, multi-level-marketing scheme, financial advice, insurance, or girl scout cookies!  Come hang out with us; nobody is trying to sell you anything.

results.description:
INTRODUCTION TO EBRU ART ( WATER MARBLING)
EBRU ART (WATER MARBLING);
Ebru’s original name was EBRE in Jagatai dialect and during its journey through Iran via the Silk Road this name was changed into EBRI (cloud-like) then ABRU (face of water). Seljukian and Ottoman periods saw a widespread performance of this art in the Asia Minor with its final name EBRU. Ebru is the only word used today in Turkey.
As the Europeans discovered this art via merchants and pilgrims at the beginning of the 17th century, they called it
TURKISH PAPER and later WATER MARBLING.
EBRU PRACTICE
Traditionally Ebru is done in WATER that has been thickened with the addition of the naturally occurring substance, GUM tragacanth, a special type of glue.
PAINTS obtained form mineral oxides, again another natural product, one mixed with OX-GALL, and then sprinkled over the surface of the water and dispersed with the help of brushes made from rose branches and horse hair.
The design that occurs on the surface of the water can be given form, motifs and flower DESIGNs can be added, and then placing a sheet of PAPER over the design, the design is transferred to the new medium.
results.name: Brooklyn Turkish Cultural Center Ebru Class (Marbling Art)

results.description: Based in New York City, our intent is to be a community where we can learn to love well. We want to make our love specific towards each other, people, the city, and life we encounter everyday. As we learn to live the way of Jesus, we tolerate a fairly high level of theological diversity and struggle, and try not to be easily breakable. We have very little formal organizational structure. We are not formally associated with any denomination, and we admire and owe our existence to many. Our community consists of Lutherans, Catholics, Eastern Orthodox, Seventh-day Adventists, Quakers, Presbyterians, Humanists, Jews, Muslims, and many other forgotten ones. The seed that grew into Citylights faith community was a “seeker space” that met in a church basement during the winter of 2000-2001. The group was comprised of people with various spiritual backgrounds and experiences, and included both people who thought of themselves as Christians and those who didn’t. The shared purpose in coming together was to have a forum where it was safe to ask tough questions about spirituality and discuss possible answers, or open better questions, to be honest about what made sense and what didn’t, and to enjoy the community itself. Out of this group emerged the vision for a faith community that could nourish honesty, creativity, and action, at any stage in their faith journey. During 2001-2002, the core group that began Citylights spent the year studying small-group community dynamics and developing a vision and road map for the future. In the winter of 2003, we launched two small-group communities that met in apartments on a weekday night. The intention was for people to get beyond the four walls of a church building and share real life together, and to reinforce the idea that true community requires regular interaction. In June 2003, Citylights started Saturday gatherings. In the fall of 2003, Citylights developed the vision to be a “community learning to love well.” We believe that this is ultimate goal of being a follower of Jesus Christ. This vision guides both our visible and hidden curriculum. We are attempting to educate ourselves about God, ourselves, “the other,” and all of life, so we can love well. We are activists for responsibility, justice and mercy in our city, because we think that’s an expression of love for our fellow human beings. We love arts. We love to discuss. We love to sing. We love to dance. We love to eat. We want to love well and we believe that you can help us learn to love better! We are children friendly and have regular kids programing.
results.name: Citylights NYC - A Progressive Christian Community

results.description:
International Networking Week® is an initiative of BNI®. International Networking Week® will feature a number of networking events across the world.
The goal of International Networking Week® is to celebrate the key role that networking plays in the development and success of businesses across the world.
Simultaneous events will be held globally to celebrate International Networking Week®.
The focus of these events will be to bring together representatives of government, businesses and the community to network with each other, to understand the concept of good networking and to listen to talks by key networking specialists from across the world. These speakers will offer advice and information on how businesses can grow and succeed through good networking practices.
Invitations to attend are open to the wider business community, members of other networking organisations, students, press representatives and interested parties from all levels of government and business. The purpose of International Networking Week® is to raise the profile of networking in the wider community, recognising it as an essential tool for success in today’s business climate.

results.description:
The young Korean American Network (yKAN) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit, non-partisan organization of 1.5 and 2nd generation Korean-Americans in the New York City area. The organization consists primarily of young professionals from various job industries, as well as academic fields. All members are volunteers who volunteer their time in order to help promote and advance the Korean-American presence in American society. 

To learn more, check out http://ykan.org 

----------------------------------------- 


History: 

The young Korean American Network started in 1989, however was officially inaugurated in August 30, 1990 as a 501(c)(3) non-profit, non-partisan organization. Their first president, Michael Han, was a founding member who sought to create the organization as a response to the lack of a networking hub for the Korean-American community in New York. Since its inauguration, the organization has grown in the past two decades in number with over 5,000 members receiving the organizations newsletters and announcements. 


Mission: 

“…is to elevate Korean-American professionals by fostering educational programs, community service, and networking opportunities. Through these activities yKAN addresses the issues of our community and provides a forum for those who share common experiences and face similar challenges.” 


Objectives: 

- Create a professional network to facilitate the even exchange of ideas and common goals among all Korean American professionals 

- Foster a professional Korean

-American presence in our community by sponsoring educational programs and opportunities 

- Promote social awareness and activism through community service 

- Foster mutual understanding between Korean-Americans and other ethnic groups 

- Promote greater opportunities for the current and future generations of all Korean Americans
results.name: Young Korean American Network (http://ykan.org)

results.description:
What do we all have in common? 

We all share this three-pound organ. It is the palace of intelligence, interpreter of the senses, initiator of body movement, and monitor of behavior. Our brain connects us, yet diversifies us beyond belief. The study of the brain is too vast to not spark curiosity. 


Psychology Lectures

In this group, you will learn about the foundations and extensions of behavioral neuroscience, social cognitive development, mental illnesses, treatments and much, much more. There is no cap to what you will learn in this group. 

Our lecturers are experienced psychologists, social workers, and academic professors. Not only will we have lectures, but we will also have workshops allowing you to socialize and network with like-minded individuals. 


Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD) as an Initial Focus

We have to start somewhere. Our initial one or two lectures will be about OCD.  Whether you have been suffering from Obsessive Compulsive Disorder (OCD) for years/have a family member suffering or you are just curious about it, join this group. You will learn about the foundations of OCD in terms of research, experiences and treatments from people who actually work in the field ranging from licensed social workers to PhDs.
results.name: The Psychology Lecture Series

I've always wanted to join a book club but it was tough while working full-time and even harder now with a baby. So why don't we try to get together after the holidays in early 2016 and start our own? Moms AND babies will be welcome (expecting moms too, of course!), and don't put too much pressure on yourself if you can't finish the assigned books. I'll try to pick some with Audible recordings (GREAT service to use while at home with a little one) and even movies so that those of us with limited time can still join in discussion. And hey, if you don't get to the book at all, that's ok -- this is about meeting other moms and their kids through a fun activity.

Our first meetup will be scheduled on a weekday -- If there's enough interest we can also start meeting over the weekends to make it easier on working moms.

results.description:
The purpose of this group is to provide an opportunity for a small group of gay guys from the New York City area to get together, socialize and connect with one another. Activities will include movie night, drawing group, board game night, pot luck dinners and the like. Most of these activities will be conducted in the comfortable setting of my apartment in queens.

This meetup is meant to be a fun, positive, drama-free environment for a small group of gay guys who enjoy hanging out together. It will be a way to meet with others from different backgrounds and share our unique life experiences. <br> <br>

We hope to inspire and learn from one another, and have some fun while making hopefully making long lasting friendships and relationships. Join us if you are interested in meeting new people, making new friends, and having fun. <br>

Attendance will be capped at 7 guys since it will take place at my apartment. 

Please note that I do have a cat named Chewy who also looks forward to meeting you.

<br>

To maintain the group, please respect a few guidelines: 

1) If you want to join the group, please include an actual picture of yourself in your profile and answer the group questions

2) Please keep your RSVPs updated. If your plans change and you can't make it, let us know.  If you have a habit of RSVPing and not showing up with less than 24 notice, you may be dropped from the group. This keeps it fair when we have limited spots to events.

3) When meetups are at my apartment, please be respectful of the space. 


Quote to think about: “Imagine what it would be like to live in a world where you are more concerned about what you have to offer than what you have to hide.” ~Unknown


Directions: 7 train to 90 st. station

Exiting  the train, walk to the left and then, make a right onto 89th street. You will walk straight down 89th street past four avenues until you reach Northern boulevard. 

As you keep walking on 89th street, you will pass a red Santander bank. My place is across the street from a small park on 89th street.

**Please note it is a 10 minute walk in total to my place.  
Please note I do have a cat named Chewy who looks forward to meeting you.

Buzzer 23

Take elevator to 5th floor. Make a right through the grey fire door and walk to the end of the hall to apartment 510. 

There are other ways to get to my place but I think this is the simplest since you only take the 7 train and walk straight down 89th street to my apartment.

results.description:
We'll get together once a month, and at a certain point, ramp it up a bit, once every 2 weeks, or even weekly to divvy up fresh, home-cooked meals we make at home to save money and eat healthier. I myself often lack the focus, energy, time and motivation to cook healthy, wholesome meals, even though I have tons of cookbooks and know how to. Being single can do that to you, and it's not good for my waistline or my budget. We can meetup at my place (I have a large dining room and kitchen) and divide whatever meals people bring into tupperwares, taking home nice portions to eat through-out the week. One of the main reasons I don't like cooking as a single woman is leftovers... I'm not a fan... so this kind of takes care of that problem. Instead of eating the same meal 7 nights in a row, we can have 7 or more people come and eat a different meal each night of the week! My apartment has a very spacious living room, dining room and kitchen. It's best we prepare food at our own places, but if needed, we can do some meal prep at my place too. I have a slow cooker, rice cooker, deep fryer and every other cooking gadget imaginable. I'm no longer a vegetarian, so I'm open to meals of any kind. Healthy is nice though. Casseroles and one pot meals are great. We'll balance it out when we see what people plan to bring. 

Maybe we can kick back and have a few drinks too. I have a nice big patio/2nd flr. Balcony with a grill, seats, a table, etc, nice view of trees,  perfect for chilling out on.
results.name: NYC Meal Swap Group

Using a holistic approach that includes Hypnosis, Reiki Healing and Life Coaching Therapy, Empowered Hypnosis Wellness Centers help clients tap into their own Creative Self to solve life’s problems and achieve all their hopes and dreams. For more than 7 years, Empowered Hypnosis Wellness Centers’ specialists have worked with over 10,000 people to achieve balance, harmony and incredible personal power through the tools the Centers’ professionals provide. Physical Wellness – Using the non-invasive power of Reiki Healing Therapy, the specialists at Empowered Hypnosis Wellness Centers help their clients achieve energy balance and show them how to tap into the immense power that is their physical body. Subconscious Empowerment – Through Empowered Hypnosis, they are able to help clients use their subconscious mind, which represents up to 90% of their brains’ power, to solve problems and create immense personal success and satisfaction. Empowerment – Inside each of us lies the potential for massive success; our job is to tap into that together. Direction – Partnering with our specialists, you will be able to give your passions and goals structure and a path to fruition. Compassion – While change can be difficult, we are there to support and guide you with loving kindness. Wellness – Mental and physical health are the foundation upon which your success is built. results.description:
It's not everyday that you hear about "Death Cafés." So, what in the world is it? "Death Cafés are part of a global movement, to increase awareness about death with a view of helping people make more of their (finite) lives. We gather in a safe, relaxed setting to discuss death, celebrate life, and drink tea (or coffee), and eat delicious cake together. Not morbid at all! 

Death Café was started in 2011 by Jon Underwood and based on the work of Swiss sociologist Bernard Crettaz. Bernard offered "Café Mortels" in Switzerland and France. Jon read of this in a newspaper article in November 2010. Jon was already developing a project to get people talking about death and immediately knew that Bernard’s vision clicked with his. Fast forward to July 2012, when Lizzy Miles brought Death Café to the US in Columbus, Ohio. Today there are more than 2600 Death Cafés held globally…won't you be part of this growing movement? Our Death Café welcomes, and is open to the community. We have no intention of leading people to any conclusion, product or course of action…just deep conversation and cake! 

There is limited seating so please RSVP. Good-will donations are encouraged and accepted for space rental. Staten Island's Death Café is held the first Sunday of every month from 2 - 4pm. Hope to see you there!
results.name: Staten Island's Death Café

results.description: Our group is made of some donkeys, some fish, some sharks and other farmyard animals and sea creatures (and humans) that love to play poker. We play Texas NL Hold’em, Pot limit Omaha and some tournaments. Our players have a wide range of skill levels and playing styles. The game is competitive, but everyone is friendly and looking to have a good time. Professional dealers, custom chips, cable tv's always showing most sporting events when available. Sodas and beers, as well as food are provided. We have a great game, been running for over 8yrs. For the safety of our group only players who are screened will be allowed to play. We start at 7:30 daily, the game goes all night so bring your own deodorant. Email me at: Queenspokerroom@gmail.com with your personal contact information in order to get game address information and be added to the text and email list. Looking forward to seeing you across the felt!
results.name: Queens Poker Donkey club

关于我们：
北美华人科技工商联合会是北美规模最大的学界/工商界社团/组织之一。由北美知名高校、科研机构及知名企业的在校学生、在职人士及企业家校友组成。自成立以来，为北美地区各级政府、企业、高校举办过数十场大型人才招聘会/招财引智洽谈会，筹备了数十余场国际上具备一定影响力的科技，金融高端峰会，应邀嘉宾来自美国主流社会以及国内政商学界精英1000多人次。在芝加哥，硅谷，纽约，华盛顿，波士顿，温哥华，慕尼黑，特拉维夫全球各地进行各个领域的专业培训。多年来安排访问交流人数近3000余人。出席活动嘉宾包括美国前国务卿鲍威尔，澳大利亚前总理陆克文等世界名流。常年策划大型新年，元宵，国庆晚会，历届晚会皆有近1200人参加。并在2014年成功筹备中美建交35周年大型文艺晚会的杰出工作获得了国务院侨办等众多机构的贺函。
北美华人科技工商联合会微信公众平台有近5800人订阅，电子邮件系统有近3万余人订阅，欢迎更多的多元化合作形式。通过整合其在北美地区政府/高校/研究机构、企业和商会的良好资源，积极搭建科技界和工商界更直接更广泛沟通和结合的桥梁，推进科技技术在工商企业转化，协助创办高新科技产业。

results.description:
Hi there, This group is open to all homeschoolers and anyone interested in homeschooling. I started this group to establish a gathering that caters to raising godly children. It is so important for us to learn, teach, and demonstrate virtues (moral excellence) to our little ones. Meet-ups involve one or more of the following:  prayer, bible reading/teaching, goal-setting for our children, teaching colors, numbers, ABC's, teaching textures, shapes, and sizes, scripture memory, outdoor exploring, learning through nature, arts and crafts, health and fitness introduction, library meet-ups, discussions. My hope is to unite people committed to raising godly children, and for us to all grow as we seek direction from God. Let us get together and see what the Lord has in store. 

You are especially welcome to this group if you have realized that parenting is more than you can handle on your own.  You are especially welcome to this group If you have some relational issues that have not been resolved and you know it is affecting your parenting.  You are especially welcome if you don't know where you stand with God.  Everyone is in a different place in life and God knows it already.  

There will be many resources shared during our meet-ups to coach us and help us along the parenting journey.  So come on in and stay awhile.
results.name: Yonkers Homeschooling Meetup

results.description:
* Who should join: People with general interest in p2p and marketplace lending should join. Existing employees of p2p and marketplace lending companies will probably receive the most value from these meetings.


* Why should members join: All our meetups with have talks focused on a new and changing subjects from meeting to meeting. They will start with a networking event and followed by a discussion and more networking session. One is expected to learn more and also meet interesting people at these events.

* What can members expect out of the group: The group will probably meet once a month for 2 hours in a professional event space. We expect all events to be free at this time and to have at least beer provided.

* Community: Each meeting will start with a 30 minutes networking part followed by 2 or 3 10-minutes talks and finish with another 30 minutes or more of networking and probably debate.

* Who are we ? We are a group of executives in the p2p , online and marketplace lending involved in the new Fintech wave. 

*Why are we doing this ? We all believe that p2p lending and marketplace lending will revolutionize the access of capital for everybody and that a lot is left to be built. Therefore we also believe that the industry as a whole will benefit from an exchange of information and ideas.

We share ideas, help, ressources, introductions , information and more...
results.name: P2P and Marketplace Lending Operators

results.description:
We almost gave up on church. Seriously. And we are clergy people. We were weary of "church as usual." It didn't feel authentic or honest.  Tired of wearing our Sunday best and praying prayers with words we wouldn't normally use, we began to think Jesus is more concerned with how we care for the poor and the marginalized than if we "worship" in a certain way. We had a lot of reservations about the Church.

However, there are some good church people out there. And some of these people said to us, "Well then start something you'd like to be part of!" And so, here we are, trying to start something that we want to be part of!  Something new.  Something fresh.  Something different from "church as usual."

This meet up is for people who are tired of playing church. We aren't looking for a new program, model, or style. We are wrestling with a fundamental shift in how we view our mission as Christ followers and how we live that out in our city. We are those who have walked away from church because we feel that "going to church" is just not the most faithful way to follow Jesus. We have questions. We are messy and imperfect and yet we believe the mess is what makes us beautiful and interesting.  We aren't necessarily looking for answers but for those who will accompany us on this journey. 

You are invited to join our conversation.  Whether you are still connected to a particular religious tradition, have walked away from religion altogether, are spiritual but not religious, are questioning, or simply want an imperfect community of people who will care for and challenge you to be open to God, you are invited.
results.name: Nones and Dones of Long Beach, NY

results.description:
As men, we're not very often taught how to dress as we're growing up. For some of us, our mom's picked out our clothing... and now we're older -- we're either still shopping with our sisters, asking for a good female friend for advice or simply browsing the interwebs for the best male fashion advice we can find. That is if we even care about how we dress.

The reality is that how we present ourselves has a huge impact in our dating lives, in our ability to land a great job and in how people perceive us overall. By dressing and presenting yourself better you will automatically have more success in your business life, in your dating life, in your relationships and you will notice that people act differently towards you overall. This group will teach you how to be the best dressed man in the room -- regardless of the occasion. Everyone will notice. Get ready to have more success in your business life, dating/relationship life, and to get more compliments all across the board. Come join us for one of our events!

Personally, my agenda is to have lots of fun and meet all you awesome people out there. Can't wait to meet you!
Esther

topics.name: Divorced Support For Men and Fathers

results.description:
Fun? During divorce? It isn't just possible — it's necessary!

We are striving to be a vital, active, and top-notch community of single parents and divorcees of Indian origin (anybody belonging to Indian Sub-continent) in the quad-state area of CT, NY, NJ, and PA . This group was started by few who are in similar situation, somehow crossed their paths, and subsequently became good friends and who are also very passionate about providing a low pressure way to connect with other single parents and divorcees on movies, recitals, hikes, festivals, kids activities, happy hours, dinners out, lunches, pot-lucks, picnics, social activities, fun events and more. Although, we are a small group but we want to have an organic growth only with like minded people.


Divorce is hard and solo parenting is not easy either. The mission of this group is to get divorcees, single parents and children out interacting with each other for fun, humor, laughs, camaraderie, support and friendship, and to enhance lives in the process. Few members that we have, often describe that the relationships forged in this group are often deep and rich. This is true of the friendships our kids would make with other kids in the group as well as the relationships their parents form. Most members describe the group as “family.” 

We try to run this group in a very professional, non-judgmental (“Don’t judge others because they sin differently than you do.”), and impartial manner (avoiding conflict of interest, if any) – “Nirbhay Nirvaer”. It is extremely important to maintain high degree of integrity and respect for each other. We expect that members will follow through on their commitments to attend an event when they RSVP “Yes.” Chronic no-shows or late cancellations may result in removal from the group. We also have a WhatsApp chat for people to connect in real-time. Please contact us if you want to be a member of WhatsApp chat(1-917-825-3695/1-609-354-8080).

We all know the trials and tribulations of single parents and divorcees. We provide a unique and amazing opportunity for support and friendship. It is only possible by the efforts of the all-volunteer organizers and event hosts. Please show your appreciation to our volunteers who put out the time, effort (and sometimes their own money) to organize and host wonderful events, and come up with amazing ideas to post these events. Sometimes a simple thank-you can make the effort worthwhile.

We’d love for you to host an event, too! If you would like to host an event, please contact us to indicate that you are interested in becoming an event organizer of the group. Once you are made an event-organizer, you can then create your own events without asking anyone to create one for you.

Thank you so much for joining now your group :). We’re so much looking forward to meeting you.

PS

This is not a “singles” dating group.  While we do not discourage dating in the group, our focus is on activities and events that foster friendships and support for the parents and kids in our group. While don’t police or baby-sit our WhatsApp chat, please refrain from obscenity, cussing, and porn on WhatsApp chat and be respectful to other members. Also, we do not allow former partners of existing members to join the group. This is open only to people of Indian sub-continent origin. Your participation in this group and at event(s) is at the discretion of the organizer(s).
results.name: Divorced Desi's

results.description:
Just in time for a new start in 2016, this group will provide a fun and easy platform for it's members to stay focused and accountable so that the New Year can be the best ever. The concept is simple, doing small easy tasks consistently ultimately leads to big, wonderful results. The problem is most of us get endlessly distracted and rarely keep on track long enough to get the fantastic results we're fully capable experiencing. 

Enter the Fun Accountability Club. Membership to this group will include access to a highly effective Personal Tracking Tool, An innovative program that let's you make big progress with small comfortable steps, Group support, Accountability Partnerships, A Spreadsheet that tracks results, contests and games and some wonderful prizes for positive progress. We'd like this group to stay relatively small so it's not overwhelming with the goal of creating actual friendships, not just never ending meetup hang outs.
